casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Patrick MYLETT 6A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 11, 2019 W. Rob Heroy, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Mylett, Patrick. Matthew W. Sawchak, Solicitor General, James W. Doggett, Deputy Solicitor General, Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Ryan Y. Park, Deputy Solicitor General.

Noell P. Tin, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Pennsylvania Center for the First Amendment.

*582The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of March 2019 by Pennsylvania Center for the First Amendment for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of March 2019."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
